short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds extra links to the MSDN Kinect V2 C++ Documentation

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a tiny extension which adds links to type descriptions on the Kinect V2 SDK's C++ documentation library - e.g. for the IKinectSensor interface. This extension affects only pages concerning the Kinect V2 SDK documentation on Microsoft's MSDN library.
